channel.title: Hoster -.-
channel.description:
Guys i need a hoster 24 7 can recieve will be co-owner...but over time i will probably start to host on my own... :P watch my youtube video for more information...
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VT4TJKd-IDo&feature=channel_video_title
and if this isn't server help, someone please redirect me but for the main part...it kinda is...so
or if someone was kind enough to tv with me and pretty much tell me HOW TO HOST because i thought i portforwarded, and editted my files correctly but idk...so that would be sooo much better if you could just do that...
